name: The Monetary Matters Network
title: The Best Trades Are the Hardest to Make – Here’s Why
text:
Synopsis
Successful investment strategies often require taking counterintuitive positions that are psychologically challenging, demanding a systematic and rules-based approach that remains unmoved by social or political pressures.

Key Insights
- The most profitable trades are typically the most difficult to execute from social, political, and psychological perspectives
- In January 2022, shorting bonds was an unpopular but ultimately successful investment strategy
- The speaker emphasizes the importance of a rules-based and systematic investment approach
- The speaker anticipates emerging market setups that will be challenging for most investors to pursue
